name: Apollo Outrage Kids Bike - 18" Wheel
description:
If you’re looking for a first mountain bike, then look no further than the Apollo Outrage Kids Bike. Taking elements of Adult Apollo Mountain Bikes and applying them to this mini version for kids, the Apollo Outrage is perfect for aspiring trail riders or just kids who fancy getting muddy at the park!

As one of the UK’s longest running bicycle brands, Apollo Bikes have been producing value for money, high quality bikes for everyday cyclists for many years. Tried, tested, and sold here in the UK, there is an Apollo Bike for all types of cyclists.

Apollo Kids Bikes have a variety of fun designs and exciting children’s characters to make cycling fun for you and your little ones. The range of Apollo Kids Bikes are tailored to suit family life and keep children safe, so that as parents, you have full peace of mind that your child is riding safely alongside you.
brakeType: Front and rear V-Brakes give reliable and consistent stopping power
frame: Strong mountain bike style frame in sturdy steel
guarantee: We take the quality of our bikes seriously, which is why we offer a lifetime guarantee* on frames and forks.

name: Apollo Zest Junior Mountain Bike Pink Saddle - 20" Wheel
description: With front suspension to absorb any bumps you may face, the Apollo Zest Junior Mountain Bike Pink Saddle - 20" Wheel is perfect for tackling off-road trails. With its 6-speed gearing, riding hills are no problem and with alloy brake levers, you are assured firm stopping power after you race back down.
brakeType: V brakes and alloy brake levers to ensure firm stopping power
suspension: Front suspension for improved comfort over bumpy trails
additionalFeatures: Hill riding is made easy with the 6-speed gears and revo shift shifters making gear changes easy and smooth
guarantee: We take the quality of our bikes seriously, which is why we offer a lifetime guarantee* on frames and forks.

name: Apollo Cipher Junior Bike - 26" Wheel
description: Bridge the gap between kids bikes and adult bikes with Apollo Cipher Junior Bike - 26" Wheel. With front suspension forks, the Apollo Cipher Junior Bike - 26" Wheel provides a smooth ride, while its 18-speed Shimano gear ensures any hills you may experience will be effortless.
forks: Suspension forks for durability and comfort
additionalFeatures: Easy to use 18-speed Shimano gearing for fast and comfortable shifting
guarantee: We take the quality of our bikes seriously, which is why we offer a lifetime guarantee* on frames and forks.
